Level: 3
Category: Oil
Time: 1 hour
Component Cost: See Alchemical Item
Market Price: 120 gp
Key Skill: Arcana or Nature or Thievery (no check)

This paralyzing oil is applied to a weapon to make your attacks slow your enemies' advances.

Slow-Step Oil
Level 3 Uncommon

A weapon coated with this white oil has the power to slow the movement of a foe.

Price: 30 gp
Alchemical Item

Power (Consumable): Standard Action. Apply slow-step oil to your weapon or one piece of ammunition. Make a secondary attack against the next creature you hit with the coated weapon or ammunition: +6 vs. Fortitude; on a hit, the target is slowed (save ends).
